attributes.action: Support our Police who are trying to stop 'Mobile Phones' being used while driving.
attributes.additional_details:
Please support our Police on this serious issue which Kills or injures, they say it will be the biggest killer on our roads next year, the Penalty needs upgrading with a ban and increase in fines as the penalty has little effect at this time.

Think that it could be one of your family members one day Killed or Injured, tests show there is no difference with being over the top with Drink and this, action needs to be taken as these drivers do not have any regard with the Laws.

Please support this and save lives.

Thanks
